name: Snerydnings klikker
description:
My first game! :)

Simple clicker snow shoveling game made in java.

Java download: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/#jdk19-windows

Made for the "Svendborg HTX Game Jam - Emne: \"Sne\""

Mostly in danish btw :|

Have fun!
